Html:
Hi everyone,

i want to use the Wrap 920 AR with the tutorial 13 but somehow it looks a little bit weird. I can ensure that i haven't modified the source code from the tutorial. However, the marker recognition works fine but i can see the scene twice like its on both, the right and the left display. How do i fix this issue or where does it come from. Is it usual that the resolution of the displays are that bad that i cannot even read text from my monitor ? The resolution is a problem i can live with but i really want to figure out how to use the Tutorial that i can only see the scene once.

regards

LordTribual
